page.title: 10HOMELIFE(CONT.)
page.content: On Sunday morning I get up at about 10.30 and go down stairs to make a cup of tea for my mum,dad & sister Karen. After we have got dressed Karen & I go to the shop for some sweets & a newspaper. When we get back mum & dad have the dinner in the oven.We have beef,chicken,pork chops,lamb or turkey ,with carrots,yorkshire pudding & new potatoes.My mum lets me mix the gravy. After our dinner,Karen and I wash & dry the pots.Then we get ready to go out.Sometimes to the pub,where I have a drink of Coke and a packet of crisps.My mum has lime & lemon & my dad has a pint of beer.We get home for 8.00 and watch television until 10.00 & I go to bed for 9 hours so that I am ready for school in the morning.
